name: Group 16 - "Boomstick"
description:
Please note that the WebGL build above contains no optimisations and runs poorly due to the normal-map driven real-time lighting system.  For the best experience, please download the latest Windows build here.

Group 16 is comprised of:

  • Fraser King - Level 5 Designer/Manager
  • Mircea Lazar - Level 5 Designer/Manager
  • Harry Wadman - Level 4 Programmer
  • Mihai Giurea - Level 4 Designer
